mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEST (GAT_PLAN_DATE, GAT_PLAN_ADDR, GAT_PLAN_ADDR_DETAIL, GAT_PLAN_TITLE, GAT_PLAN_DESC, GATHERING_GAT_ID) VALUES (#{GAT_PLAN_DATE}, #{GAT_PLAN_ADDR}, #{GAT_PLAN_ADDR_DETAIL}, #{GAT_PLAN_TITLE}, #{GAT_PLAN_DESC}, #{GATHERING_GAT_ID})
mapper.select: SELECT GATHERING_GAT_ID FROM TEST WHERE SOME_CONDITION = SOME_VALUE -- 필요에 따라 WHERE 절을 추가하여 쿼리를 작성합니다.
